qas.question: What city department runs the public school system?

answers.text: New York City Department of Education

qas.question: How many students are in New York City public schools?
About how many public schools are there in New York City?
How many high schools for gifted students does New York City have?
How many students regularly attend schools in NYC?
How many highschools are specialized in NYC?

context: The New York City Public Schools system, managed by the <a0_0>New York City Department of Education<a0_0/>, is the largest public school system in the United States, serving about <a1_0><a4_0>1.1 million<a4_0/><a1_0/> students in more than <a2_0>1,700<a2_0/> separate primary and secondary schools. The city's public school system includes <a3_0><a5_0>nine<a5_0/><a3_0/> specialized high schools to serve academically and artistically gifted students.
